BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.CDCServer.startInternal(List, int) needlessly boxes a boolean constant
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.CDCServer.startInternal(List, int) needlessly boxes a boolean constant
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.CDCServer.startInternal(List, int) needlessly boxes a boolean constant
org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.CDCServer.startInternal(List, int): 1st parameter 'addresses' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.CDCServer.startInternal(List, int) does not presize the allocation of a collection
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.ShardingSphereProxy.lambda$start$0(String, ChannelFuture) prints the stack trace to the console
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.ShardingSphereProxy.initServerBootstrap(ServerBootstrap) needlessly boxes a boolean constant
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.ShardingSphereProxy.initServerBootstrap(ServerBootstrap) needlessly boxes a boolean constant
org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.ShardingSphereProxy.startInternal(int, List): 2nd parameter 'addresses' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.ShardingSphereProxy.startInternal(int, List) does not presize the allocation of a collection
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.exception.CircuitBreakException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.exception.UnsupportedCommandException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value

Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.netty.CDCChannelInboundHandler.processDropStreamingRequest(ChannelHandlerContext, CDCRequest, CDCConnectionContext) converts checked exception to unchecked

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.netty.CDCChannelInboundHandler.processLogin(ChannelHandlerContext, CDCRequest, CDCConnectionContext) encodes String bytes without specifying the character encoding

org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.netty.CDCChannelInboundHandler.processLogin(ChannelHandlerContext, CDCRequest, CDCConnectionContext): 2nd parameter 'request' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.cdc.protocol.request.CDCRequestOrBuilder instead
